69: The Maintenance Controller will monitor, expedite, coordinate and direct line maintenance performed on all ABX aircraft; provide technical assistance to line representatives and contract agencies; interface with ABX departments in support of operational and other requirements; perform other duties as assigned. Requirements: High School Diploma/GED A&P License 4 years experience in the maintenance of commercial transport aircraft Strong troubleshooting, analytical, interpersonal and written and oral communication skills Ability to work independently, accept responsibility, make decisions with direct impact on dispatch reliability of ABX fleet Preferred skills: 2 years supervisory/lead experience Experience on aircraft type operated by ABX Commercial airline Maintenance Control experience Experience in Powerplant Avionics and Structures Bilingual - Spanish speaking preferred by Jobble
